title.en: Great Praise of the Twelve Acts of the Buddha

text.en: With skilful means and compassion, you were born in the Śākya clan,
text.en-trans: tabkhé tukjé shakyé rik su trung

text.en: Unconquerable by others, you vanquished Māra's hordes,
text.en-trans: zhen gyi mitub dü kyi pung jompa

text.en: Your physical form resplendent, like a mountain of gold.
text.en-trans: ser gyi lhünpo tabur jipé ku

text.en: To you, the King of the Śākyas, I pay homage!1
text.en-trans: shakyé gyalpo khyö la chaktsal lo

text.en: You I shall praise, who first awakened the mind of enlightenment,
text.en-trans: gang gi dangpor changchub tukkyé né

text.en: Then completed the accumulations of merit and wisdom,
text.en-trans: sönam yeshe tsok nyi dzok dzé ching

text.en: And now in this age, through the vast sway of your actions,
text.en-trans: dü dir dzepa gyachen drowa yi

text.en: Have become the lord and protector of living beings.
text.en-trans: gön gyur khyö la dak gi töpar gyi

text.en: Homage to you, who, having taught the gods,
text.en-trans: lha nam dön dzé dulwé dü khyen né

text.en: Knew the time had come to tame the human world, and
text.en-trans: lha lé bab né langchen tar shek shing

text.en: Descending from the god realm like a great elephant,
text.en-trans: rik la zik né lhamo gyutrulmé

text.en: Foresaw the family of your birth and entered the womb of Māyādevī.
text.en-trans: lhum su zhukpar dzé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, prince of the Śākyas, born after ten months
text.en-trans: dawa chu dzok shakyé sepo ni

text.en: In the auspicious Lumbinī grove, where
text.en-trans: tashi lumbi tsal du tampé tsé

text.en: Brahmā and Indra revered you, your supreme marks
text.en-trans: tsang dang gyajin gyi tü tsen chok ni

text.en: Proving you were destined to be enlightened.
text.en-trans: changchub rik su ngedzé chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, lion among men, in all your youthful vigour,
text.en-trans: zhönnu tobden mi yi sengé dé

text.en: Displaying your prowess in the games at Aṅga-Magadha,
text.en-trans: anga magadhar ni gyutsal ten

text.en: Where you triumphed over the proud contestants,
text.en-trans: kyewo drekpachen nam tsarché né

text.en: So that not one could stand as your rival.
text.en-trans: drenda mepar dzé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, who, to comply with worldly convention,
text.en-trans: jikten chö dang tünpar jawa dang

text.en: And avoid all misdeeds, took on a queen and courtiers
text.en-trans: khana mato pang chir tsünmo yi

text.en: And by acting with such skilful means,
text.en-trans: khor dangden dzé tab la khepa yi

text.en: So you ruled the kingdom.
text.en-trans: gyalsi kyongwar dzé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, who saw that saṃsāra is wholly futile,
text.en-trans: khorwé jawar nyingpo mé zik né

text.en: Renounced the life of a householder,
text.en-trans: khyim né jung té kha la shek né kyang

text.en: And, travelling through the sky,
text.en-trans: chörten namdak drung du nyi lé nyi

text.en: Ordained yourself before the Viśuddha Stūpa.
text.en-trans: rabtu jungwar dzé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, who, intent on persevering till enlightened,
text.en-trans: tsönpé changchub drubpar gong né ni

text.en: For six years practised austerities on the banks of the Nairañjanā,
text.en-trans: nairanjané dram du lo druk tu

text.en: And taking diligence to its ultimate perfection,
text.en-trans: kawa ché dzé tsöndrü tarchinpé

text.en: Attained the supreme samādhi.
text.en-trans: samten chok nyé dzé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, who, seeking to make meaningful
text.en-trans: tokma mé né bepa dönyö chir

text.en: All your efforts, made throughout beginningless time, sat
text.en-trans: magadha yi changchub shingdrung du

text.en: Unmoving in the vajra posture beneath the bodhi-tree in Magadha
text.en-trans: kyiltrung miyo ngönpar sangye né

text.en: And awakened into true buddhahood, attaining perfect enlightenment.
text.en-trans: changchub dzokpar dzé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, who, in your compassion,
text.en-trans: tukjé dro la nyurdu zik né ni

text.en: Gazed at once upon living beings, then
text.en-trans: varanasi lasok né chok tu

text.en: Turned the wheel of Dharma in sacred places like Vārāṇasī,
text.en-trans: chö kyi khorlo kor né dulja nam

text.en: And established disciples in the three vehicles.
text.en-trans: tekpa sum la gö dzé chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, who destroyed evil-minded opponents,
text.en-trans: zhen gyi golwa ngenpa tsarché chir

text.en: By defeating the six teachers of the tīrthikas, Devadatta and the rest,
text.en-trans: mutek tönpa druk dang lhejin sok

text.en: As well as the māras in Vārāṇasī;2
text.en-trans: khormo jik gi yul du dü nam tul

text.en: You were the mighty sage, victorious in battle.
text.en-trans: tubpa yul lé gyal la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, who performed great miracles in Śrāvastī,
text.en-trans: sipa sum na pemé yönten gyi

text.en: Unmatched in their splendour in all the three realms,
text.en-trans: nyen du yöpar chotrul chenpo ten

text.en: And through the offerings made by gods, humans and other beings,
text.en-trans: lhami drowa kün gyi rab chöpa

text.en: Caused the teachings to prosper and increase.
text.en-trans: tenpa gyepar dzé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, who, to spur the lazy on to the Dharma,
text.en-trans: lelo chen nam chö la kuljé chir

text.en: Left your body, though immortal and like a vajra,
text.en-trans: tsachok drong gi sazhi tsangma ru

text.en: And passed into parinirvāṇa
text.en-trans: chimé dorjé tabü ku shek né

text.en: In the pure abode of Kuśinagara.
text.en-trans: nya ngen dawar dzé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, who, to show that you had not in reality perished,
text.en-trans: yangdak nyi du jikpamé chir dang

text.en: And so that beings of the future could gain merit,
text.en-trans: ma ong semchen sönam tobjé chir

text.en: Emanated a wealth of relics, and caused
text.en-trans: denyi du ni ringsel mang trul né

text.en: Your remains to be divided into eight portions.
text.en-trans: kudung cha gyé dzé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Through the merit of briefly praising in this way,
text.en-trans: de tar tenpé dakpo chomden gyi

text.en: The great acts of the lord who is master of the teachings,
text.en-trans: dzepé tsul la do tsam töpa yi

text.en: May the actions of all living beings
text.en-trans: gewé drowa kun gyi chöpa yang

text.en: Come to equal those of the Sugata himself.
text.en-trans: deshek nyi kyi chö dang tsung par shok

text.en: O Tathāgata, may I and others have a form,
text.en-trans: dezhin shekpa khyé ku chindra dang

text.en: An entourage, a lifespan, a pure realm
text.en-trans: khor dang ku tsé tsé dang zhing kham dang

text.en: And sublime marks of perfection
text.en-trans: khyé kyi tsen chok zangpo chindra wa

text.en: Exactly like you.
text.en-trans: dé dra khonar dak sok gyurwar shok

text.en: Through the power of our praising you and this prayer,
text.en-trans: khyé la tö ching solwa tabpé tü

text.en: In whatever lands we dwell, may
text.en-trans: dak sok gang du nepé sa chok su

text.en: Illness, negativity, poverty, and conflict be quelled,
text.en-trans: né dang wul pong taptsö zhiwa dang

text.en: And Dharma and auspiciousness increase and spread.3
text.en-trans: chö dang tashi pelwar dzé du söl
